user.title: KKT Kolbe Integration Setup
user.description:
Choose your setup method for KKT Kolbe devices.

**Recommended:** SmartLife (no developer account required)

smartlife_user_code.title: SmartLife User Code
smartlife_user_code.description:
Enter your SmartLife/Tuya Smart App User Code.

**How to find your User Code:**
1. Open the SmartLife or Tuya Smart App
2. Go to **Profile** (bottom right)
3. Tap the **Settings** icon (top right)
4. Select **Account and Security**
5. Find your **User Code** at the bottom

The User Code is a unique identifier for your account.

data_description.user_code: Your User Code from the SmartLife/Tuya Smart App (found in Profile > Settings > Account and Security)
data_description.app_schema: Select which app you are using

smartlife_scan.title: Scan QR Code
smartlife_scan.description:
Scan this QR code with your SmartLife or Tuya Smart App.

**Instructions:**
1. Open the SmartLife/Tuya Smart App
2. Tap **Profile** (bottom right)
3. Tap the **Scan** icon (top right)
4. Scan the QR code displayed below
5. Confirm the login in the app

Waiting for you to scan and confirm...

smartlife_scan_timeout.title: Scan Timeout
smartlife_scan_timeout.description:
The QR code scan timed out. This can happen if:
- The QR code was not scanned in time
- The login was not confirmed in the app

Would you like to try again?

data_description.retry: Generate a new QR code and try scanning again
data_description.back: Go back to enter a different User Code

smartlife_scan_failed.title: Authentication Failed
smartlife_scan_failed.description:
The SmartLife authentication failed. This can happen if:
- The wrong User Code was entered
- The QR code scan was cancelled
- There was a network error

Would you like to try again?

data_description.retry: Generate a new QR code and try again
data_description.back: Go back to enter a different User Code
